caption: In this video, the protagonist and his friend are investigating an explosion and discover the true identity of a banker living in Colombia. The protagonist deduces that the real culprits behind the explosion are banker Ian Munford and his wife, who killed another banker to commit insurance fraud. The protagonist and his friend uncover Ian Munford's true identity and trace him to his residence in Colombia. The friend discovers clues left by the culprits and assists the protagonist in solving the mystery. Investigations indicate that the mastermind behind the explosion could be the protagonist's nemesis. A television celebrity, Connie Prince, is found dead, and the protagonist suspects this might also be connected to his nemesis. Through their investigation, the protagonist finds out Connie Prince was murdered, and the likely suspect is her brother. Observing the deceased's body, the protagonist surmises that the murderer might have used poison. They identify the true identity of Connie Prince's brother and apprehend him. Investigations reveal that Connie Prince's brother killed her to inherit her estate. The protagonist solves the mysteries of both cases, showcasing his deductive abilities.
